data.title: Ukuharura ibindu
data.table:
| Umuharuro | umuharuro gwe'biindu mu magambo | Kwo tugayandika mu muharuro |
| --------- | ------------------------------- | --------------------------- |
| 1         | Mugazi muguma                   | 1 mugazi                    |
| 2         | Migazi ibiri                    | 2 migazi                    |
| 3         | Migazi ishatu                   | 3 migazi                    |
| 4         | Migazi ina                      | 4 migazi                    |
| 5         | Migazi itanu                    | 5 migazi                    |
| 6         | Migazi ndatu                    | 6 migazi                    |
| 7         | Migazi iriinda                  | 7 migazi                    |
| 8         | Migazi munaana                  | 8 migazi                    |
| 9         | Migazi mweenda                  | 9 migazi                    |
| 10        | Migazi ikumi                    | 10 migazi                   |
